title: Show three code reward buttons after clicking the final codes action

requirements.text: After the user answers "Yes" to both questionnaire questions, show a final action button labeled "Get Some Codes" (English text). When the user clicks this button, display three buttons with the exact labels: "Sub2AcerXDucky = 4500 Money", "FunTrollTower6 = 3000 Money", and "ILoveTT6 = 1200 Money".

quotes: If you click on Get Some Codes 3 buttons will appear first one will be:   Sub2AcerXDucky = 4500 Money 2nd one will be FunTrollTower6 = 3000 Money and the last 3rd one will be ILoveTT6 = 1200 Money

acceptanceCriteria: If the user has not answered "Yes" to both questions, the "Get Some Codes" button is not visible.
If the user has answered "Yes" to both questions, the "Get Some Codes" button is visible.
Clicking "Get Some Codes" reveals exactly three buttons.
The three revealed buttonsâ€™ visible text matches exactly: "Sub2AcerXDucky = 4500 Money", "FunTrollTower6 = 3000 Money", and "ILoveTT6 = 1200 Money".
The three code buttons are not shown before clicking "Get Some Codes".

constraints: Frontend files listed as immutable must not be edited (compose existing UI components instead).
Preserve the existing gating behavior: codes must remain inaccessible unless both questionnaire answers are "Yes".
Keep the app as a single-page flow within the existing page (no new routes required).
nonGoals: No backend changes or persistence of code usage/redemptions.
No additional questionnaire questions or alternative eligibility rules.
No third-party integrations or authentication changes.
